title: People want loot boxes so much that EA got over 300K downvotes on reddit.
body:
https://www.reddit.com/r/StarWarsBattlefront/comments/7cff0b/seriously_i_paid_80_to_have_vader_locked/dppum98/

I still can't believe Riot was either too tone deaf or greedy enough to pretend people wanted loot boxes in League.
